pullRequest.title: friendicons: add note icon in friends/ignore list

nodes.bodyText: This should use its own icon. (whether that's a copy of the notes plugin's icon or something else is fine) Maybe there's an ingame sprite which might work well for this?
How do you come to 14x12 as the dimensions? The scripts seem to indicate that the "Previous name" icon is 14x14
Since the meaning the parameters is known, they should be listed in the javadoc. See some of the earlier ScriptID entries for examples.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -233,4 +233,16 @@
 	 */
 	@ScriptArguments(integer = 2)
 	public static final int TOPLEVEL_RESIZE = 909;
+
+	/**
+	 * Called when the friends list is updated

nodes.bodyText: While this file doesn't seem to maintain the usual definitions order of getConfig(), startUp(), shutDown(), @Subscribers, then instance/static methods (it has some instance methods mixed with the subscribers), shutDown() should definitely be defined here before defining any more subscribers.
Check both config group and config key.
Make the plugin's config group package-private and reference it here.
I would maybe also check iconidx somehow isn't set here
What is this for? can this happen?
The license header should be added to all new files.

commit.message:
scripts: add FriendUpdate and IgnoreUpdate

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>

friendicons: add note icon in friends/ignore list

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>
